name: Crack the code (Houtarou Oreki)
description:
Crack the code is a simple puzzle game.

It is made in in Microsoft Powerpoint 2013.

It doesn't consist of any code and is purely based on animation and triggers.

The objective of this game is to crack the code(i.e number password) based on the hints which will be given after each entry of code.

I hope you will enjoy the game.

More level will arrive soon :)

Requirements- MS Powerpoint 2007 or higher
